definition: to buy tickets/(Tw) to buy votes (in an election)

sentences.english: I bought a second-hand five Cpiece suite.
sentences.chinese: 我買了一套二手的五件套傢俱。

sentences.english: How do you really know what goes into store-bought baby food?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼真的知道什麼進店買嬰兒食品呢？

sentences.english: He bought her a gift at the duty-free shop.
sentences.chinese: 他在免稅商店裏給她買了份禮物。

sentences.english: He bought an English-Chinese dictionary in order to look up the words he doesn't know.
sentences.chinese: 他買了本英漢字典，以便查找他不認識的單詞。
這個週末我要買古董去。

sentences.english: Come and look round our shop without commitment to buy anything.
sentences.chinese: 請隨時來我們商店轉轉，不一定非要買東西。

sentences.english: I bought a new turtleneck yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我買了一件新的高領絨衣。

sentences.english: I need to buy a watch with a second hand.
sentences.chinese: 我要買一塊有秒針的表。

sentences.english: It is impossible that markets are in the same market.
sentences.chinese: 交易所記帳式債券也能在股市裏買。

sentences.english: I like playing with a bubble gun. Can you buy one for me?
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡玩泡泡槍，可以給我買一把嗎？

sentences.english: This morning I went to the shop to change the coat I bought yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 今天早晨我去服裝店調換我昨天在那買的一件衣服。

sentences.english: Look, Mike. Here'rethe jade bracelets you want.
sentences.chinese: 麥克，你看，這兒有你要買的玉手鐲。

sentences.english: Went to Centurymart with Tom, buying a bag of cookies at bakery.
sentences.chinese: 今天和小洋去聯華，在賣麪包的地方買了袋餅乾。

sentences.english: The gift can be something made or bought from a gift shop.
sentences.chinese: 能很輕鬆的禮物或買一家禮品店。

sentences.english: Rhett bought his daughter a pony to ride on.
sentences.chinese: 瑞德給他的女兒買了一匹小馬來騎。

sentences.english: He bought a platform ticket at the ticket window.
sentences.chinese: 他到售票窗口買了站臺票。

definition: to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
